page.title: 03Wareham Forest and Wildlife
page.content:
The forest is an important{wildlife } habitat with many animals and plants . There are three types of deer in Wareham Forest _{Sika, Roe and {Fallow.}The deer have to be "culled" so that the balance of the forest is maintained.{Mink and otters}are seen from time to time near the rivers. There are many{foxes and badgers.}The badgers' setts are marked on maps, so that the forest wardens can avoid disturbing them when working in the forest.
Many peole enjoy taking long walks in the forest, and so{car parks and {picnic sites}are built.
